section.title: Create project
section.para: You can also create the GWT projects directory from the command line. Open a command shell (Start-> Run -> cmd on windows),switch to the GWT installation directory (cd c:\GWT) and run the following two commands.
The final argument will be the full qualified class which will run the application.

section.title: Import project
section.para: The created files can be imported to Eclipse. Also a example runtime configuration for Eclipse is created.
Select File -> Import -> General -> Existing Project into Workspace.

section.title: Run project
section.para: Your project should have a launch configuration included. Select HelloGwt.launch, right-click on it and select Run as->HelloGwt
